an6.76:1.1: “Cha, bhikkhave, dhamme appahaya abhabbo arahattam sacchikatum.
an6.76:1.3: Manam, omanam, atimanam, adhimanam, thambham, atinipatam.
an6.76:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme appahaya abhabbo arahattam sacchikatum.
an6.76:2.1: Cha, bhikkhave, dhamme pahaya bhabbo arahattam sacchikatum.
an6.76:2.3: Manam, omanam, atimanam, adhimanam, thambham, atinipatam.
an6.76:2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme pahaya bhabbo arahattam sacchikatun”ti.
